Today in Minsk, at 16.00 on Zmitrok Byadulya Street, 11 (

) a rally against violence against migrants will be held. It will be attended by representatives of the Belarusian authorities. There we will be able to ask them questions:

- Why is Lukashenko using migrants to solve his political problems?
- Why are Lukashenko's security forces bullying us?
- Why do Lukashenko's security forces rob migrants and take away their money and phones at the border?

Come and bring your friends!
